block.p: Jennifer Ann Babbin, the daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Malcolm J. Babbin of Riverdale, the Bronx, and William M. Clark, the son of Mr. and Mrs. William Clark of Clarklake, Mich., were married yesterday at the Harmonie Club in New York by Rabbi Burt Aaron Siegel. Mrs. Clark, 29 years old, is an associate at the Boston law firm of Sullivan & Worcester. She is a magna cum laude graduate of Brandeis University. She and her husband, 30, received law degrees in 1986 from Boston University. The bridegroom is an associate at the Law Offices of Thomas S. Francis in Boston. He is a cum laude graduate of the University of Michigan.

Mrs. Clark, 29 years old, is an associate at the Boston law firm of Sullivan & Worcester. She is a magna cum laude graduate of Brandeis University. She and her husband, 30, received law degrees in 1986 from Boston University. The bridegroom is an associate at the Law Offices of Thomas S. Francis in Boston. He is a cum laude graduate of the University of Michigan.
